title: [生存地图]SKYBLOCK BEYOND——超越天际|从零开始
author: Qwe_Sakura
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Qwe_Sakura 于 2020-3-21 09:43 编辑 
SKYBLOCK BEYOND 
什么是SKYBLOCK BEYOND? SKYBLOCK BEYOND是由KAMPFINATOR300制作的一张生存地图版本为1.14.4这是他地图的介绍In this map you will start on one oak tree with nothing but the vast void around you and through custom crafting you'll be able to get iron, gold, diamonds, go to the nether and at the end, well, go to the end and kill the ender dragon.

If you like this map, then please let me know in the comments because I would then start working on a dungeon update of the map where you can actually put the armor and accessories to good use.
在这张地图当中，你将从砍树开始，你的周围的方块非常的少，你要通过你的努力，获得铁，金，钻石，到达地狱，最后到达末地杀死末影龙如果你喜欢这种地图，请在评论(MCBBS回复)中让我知道，然后我将开始研究地图的更新，在这张地图中你可以添加其他的装备和武器
我要怎么下载SKYBLOCK BEYOND? One原帖Two百度云盘mupa
SKYBLOCK BEYOND的特点over 50 custom crafting recipes
over 30 custom advancements
shops for armor,tools and weapons
ways to increase randomTickSpeed and getting permanent potion effects
shops for offhand accessories that give you all kinds of bonuses
超过50种自定义食谱
超过30种自定义成就
地图中具有装备，工具和武器商店
增加randomTickSpeed并且可以获得永久药水效果的方法
还有饰品商店，且可以为你提供各种奖励
SKYBLOCK BEYOND的截图
